alert.note: Alert for Northeast Prince William Sound (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 09 at 5:00AM AKST until March 10 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 PM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Valdez through Thompson Pass. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 PM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty, damaging winds are expected to channel through Thompson Pass and into Valdez Friday and last into this weekend. Winds will gradually increase Thursday evening, peak Friday morning, then gradually decrease Friday afternoon through Saturday morning. Blowing snow may occur if these strong winds resuspend fallen snow, though visibility reductions are not expected to be widespread.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind. Prepare for the possibility of widespread power outages. Use caution if you must drive.
